formalpara.title: Internal help for this AGI command in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen: Usage: GET DATA <file to be streamed> [timeout] [max digits] Stream the given file, and recieve DTMF data. Returns the digits received from the channel at the other end.

formalpara.title: Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.2 to 1.4:
Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.4 to 1.6:

para.screen: --- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -1,3 +1,4 @@ Usage: GET DATA <file to be streamed> [timeout] [max digits] Stream the given file, and recieve DTMF data. Returns the digits received from the channel at the other end. + Runs Dead : No
